abstract: With a new marketing campaign, Advanced Micro Devices has decided to tout its graphics chips over its CPUs, ending many years of battling over technical specs with Intel.
snippet: With a new marketing campaign, Advanced Micro Devices has decided to tout its graphics chips over its CPUs, ending many years of battling over technical specs with Intel.
lead_paragraph: The Great Chip Wars, as we’ve come to know them, ended this week — courtesy of a new marketing campaign from Advanced Micro Devices.

headline.main: So Long CPU Wars. It Was Fun.
